cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 10th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 10th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: 4 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 4 Bed Female Only Dorm with Private Ensuite. Fully Air conditioned room with Private Shower and Toilet. Perfect set up for Girls looking to enjoy their holidays with all the comforts of a small Dorm with own Ensuite facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 4 bed Mixed Dorm (Large) - Fully Air conditioned and unlimited Free Wifi. Room access will be personalized with designated key card that will also access allocated lockers upon check in. Perfect for guests who enjoy more space in their 4 shared Dorm.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
